products.name: Roman Stud Leather Ankle Strap Flat
products.brandedName: Valentino Roman Stud Leather Ankle Strap Flat
products.unbrandedName: Roman Stud Leather Ankle Strap Flat
products.description: Introducing the Valentino Roman Stud Leather Ankle Strap Flat, a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and signature elegance. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, these flats are designed for women who value both style and comfort.These flats come in a classic black leather finish, adorned with tonal Roman studs that exude a sense of sophistication. The adjustable ankle strap with a buckle closure allows for a customized fit, ensuring a secure and comfortable wear.The lightly padded leather insole provides cushioning and support, making these flats suitable for all-day wear. The smooth leather sole offers excellent traction, allowing you to confidently stride on any surface.Valentino takes pride in offering only genuine products. While some merchandise may come from trusted independent suppliers, we guarantee the authenticity of every product sold on our site.Please note that size selections for these flats are European. For US conversions, kindly refer to the size chart. Based on feedback from our members, Valentino shoes typically run small, so we recommend sizing up a half size for most styles.Indulge in the luxury of Italian craftsmanship with these Roman Stud Leather Ankle Strap Flats from Valentino. Perfect for any occasion, these flats effortlessly elevate your ensemble with their timeless design and exquisite details.
